TopicTitle: [0.22] Ion Hybrid Electric Pack 30.08.13 --- Soon FKSP!!! See Development Monitor

Articles.Content: How about SFKSP (Sci-Fi KSP) instead? F-KSP sounds... cheesy, I think. Anyway, glad to see it back.
Btw, its quite amazing - 250 Votes in my poll

Btw, its quite amazing - 250 Votes in my poll

just shows a fraction of how many people would be upset if this was dead.. thankfully its not
You should move this over to Curse or put it up on Google Docs or Mediafire - Spaceport is coming down today.
I know Andrew, thats why i already changed SpacePort to dropbox for this release, next, updated release will go on Curse website

I've one question regarding the hybrid engines: have you considered to make them like rapier/sabre engines? I experimented with them a little bit, and the results were quite satisfying (at least for me )

And: YAY, you are back

I've been playing with your pack for a while now, you're models are just amazing! And (like others) I barely can await new stuff (especially those VTOLs)!

Ok guys, main post changed, I added Development Monitor, so you can track my actual progress, or non of it... ^^ Cargo parts you saw earlier, but to remind you:

Those are two parts, long one, and short (endings) so you would be able to customize your design as you want.

Tomorrow more pics, will show you something rly cool ^^

back to work...

I've one question regarding the hybrid engines: have you considered to make them like rapier/sabre engines? I experimented with them a little bit, and the results were quite satisfying (at least for me )

And: YAY, you are back

I've been playing with your pack for a while now, you're models are just amazing! And (like others) I barely can await new stuff (especially those VTOLs)!

That's a great idea. IMO, they should be able to change modes between a high-efficiency (410 vac Isp?) LFO engine and a high power draw, high performance ion engine. It should then use a lot of power, but also have relatively good thrust.

Checked out the updates to the first post and O_O Solar panels and Solar Wings. I think i might of just had a brain aneurism from all the excitement. VTOL engines, awesome cargo struts, and now Solar panels? Your killing me EPD, your killing me.

Ok i promised you a screenshot. So... those are Solar Wings i've been working on recently. Textures are 70-80% done, so still there will be improvements in that. But anyway Solar Wings will make your designs look awesome. Wings with a small ability to gather up energy like solar panels What do you think?

Ok i promised you a screenshot. So... those are Solar Wings i've been working on recently. Textures are 70-80% done, so still there will be improvements in that. But anyway Solar Wings will make your designs look awesome. Wings with a small ability to gather up energy like solar panels What do you think?

http://i.imgur.com/9LBzXzn.jpg

All I can say is holy crap! Now that is real snazzy!

Still haven't decide about size of those Solar Wings, and as i have ready template, maybe i will create one more shape... IF you guys will want it. After those wings, Batteries and hard part - Engines. But i can make it
Minmatar solar wings... I want those.
Looks pretty sleek, can't wait to see the finished looked.

Minmatar solar wings... I want those.

You'll have to leave them sitting out in the yard for a couple years before they acquire a proper Minmatar look.
He can just timewarp

Ok i promised you a screenshot. So... those are Solar Wings i've been working on recently. Textures are 70-80% done, so still there will be improvements in that. But anyway Solar Wings will make your designs look awesome. Wings with a small ability to gather up energy like solar panels What do you think?

http://i.imgur.com/9LBzXzn.jpg

Wow! I thought "solar wings" would just be really big solar panels! This is awesome!

Uhm.... is there any way you can make these parts compatible for Career Mode? I seldom if ever use Sandbox Mode, and to have the parts only usable there... makes these awesome parts leaving a lot to be desired.
Here's what the solar wings remind me of:
can someone give a description about what it is... not allready having it on front page is failure enough
can someone give a description about what it is... not allready having it on front page is failure enough
These are some beautiful parts! I hope they can be made ready for 0.23.5 and beyond

Still haven't decide about size of those Solar Wings, and as i have ready template, maybe i will create one more shape... IF you guys will want it. After those wings, Batteries and hard part - Engines. But i can make it

Might I suggest you make a few shaped wings, and make them compatible with TweakScale so that we can make parts that fit the craft, as opposed to the other way around.

i cant see the parts in the game, i got em in game data but cant see em

edit:nevermind, no career mode
